Resource Usage API

Detailed Description

select() functions and types


Functions

int select (int reserved0, void const *reserved1, void const *reserved2, void const *reserved3, struct timeval *timeout)
 Provide synchronous I/O multiplexing.

Function Documentation

int select ( int  reserved0,
void const *  reserved1,
void const *  reserved2,
void const *  reserved3,
struct timeval *  timeout 
)

Provide synchronous I/O multiplexing.

Retrieves select usage information about the given process(es).

Parameters:
reserved0 Must be 0.
reserved1 Must be NULL.
reserved2 Must be NULL.
reserved3 Must be NULL.
timeout The timeout value.
Note:
This implementation only supports the timeout functionality.
